column3: News;Phnom Penh: According to a preliminary report
column4: a military man committed suicide by jumping from a building on October 30 at the National Defense University Building B
column6: Russey Keo District.------The dead man was a colonel from the Brigade No. 14 in Pursat
column7: who was about 45 years old.He was studying at the university.------At around 3.30am
column8: some trainees were exercising and found the victim lying on the floor
column9: the report said. At first they thought he was drunk and sleeping it off and were surprised to discover he was dead.------According to information
column10: people heard a strange sound around 12 am
column12: so the discovery was not made until later.------The motive for the suicide is unknown.------Kohsantepheap------ ------ ------ ------
